venue.address_2: across from Roxbury Crossing Orange Line station
venue.address_1: 1350 Tremont St, cor. New Dudley St
venue.name: Reggie Lewis Center

item.description:
From Kevin: Here is the most recent update I received for the 14th Annual Boston Vegetarian Food Festival on 10/22/09. Just a reminder this is a two day event, October 31st and November 1st. If you are interested in carpooling send me an e-mail with BVS CARPOOLING in the title and I will try to coordinate.

Hello Boston Vegetarian Society,

The 14th Annual Boston Vegetarian Food Festival is 9 days away!

It will fill the Reggie Lewis Athletic Center with foods, products, and information that promote veggie living and help make it fun, delicious, and easy to live a healthy, eco- and animal-friendly life.

* We ask for your help in publicizing this free event on Facebook, blogs, and with flyers and banners found on our website at www.BostonVeg.org/foodfest

* We've gotten a nice promo on boston.com : http://www.boston.com...

* We were featured with a little write-up and photo in the October Saveur magazine!

* South End News favored us with a kind article: http://www.mysouthend...

* Here is a fun short video taken at last year's Festival by Gardenburger. It reminds us of the good energy and good tasting that lies 9 days ahead! http://gardenburger.c...

* Our organizing committee member David has 30 minutes of radio time to talk about the Festival and veg*m this Sunday, 6:45 - 7:15 AM at 98.5 FM.

* It has been heartening to see the flow of volunteers who are offering help at the event. If you'd like to pitch in for a couple of hours, send us a note viahttp://www.bostonveg.... See you soon, we hope, and please bring some non-veg friends to the Festival!

Organizing Committee
Boston Vegetarian Food Festival
617-424-8846
www.BostonVeg.org

group.name: Rhode Island Vegetarian and Vegan Meetup Group

item.name: UPDATE: 14th Annual Boston Vegetarian Food Festival
